page.title: 05Education
page.content:
There are 5 schools in the survey area: { 1. Bolsover C.E. Junior (age 7-11) { 2. Bolsover Welbeck Road Infant (4-7) { 3. Castle Hall (11-13) { 4. Welbeck Hall (11-13) { 5. New Bolsover Primary (5-11) Welbeck and Castle Halls are both part of the Bolsover Secondary School.
We have traced the development of the schools from their opening dates and noted the main changes in local education.
{1. BOLSOVER C.E. JUNIOR SCHOOL
{1868}- Opened as the National School {1886,1894}- Extensions opened {1939}- Became C.E. Junior (8-11) {1948}- Age range became 7-11
